channel.title: Crash in beginning of Blast pit
channel.description: My game crashes right after reach the bottom of the elevator shaft in the beginning part of blast pit, the area with the bull squid. Any fixes? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T3_51_33C0.mdmp (151 KB)
